The Cricket Scorebook App takes a simple approach to scoring cricket. Not only that, we have features that help with coaching and improving player performance.

Features for Coaches:
* Dot ball counter - encourage kids and junior cricketers to rotate the strike to keep the scoreboard ticking
* Most common dismissals for each batter. You can analyse each batter and find the common dismissal type - i.e. you might find a batter is always caught-out. You can then coach them techniques to reduce the ball being hit the air.
* and many more coach analysis tools including total wides bowled, total strike rate, etc

Features for Scorers:
* Do you sometimes forget to score a ball? We have a smart reminder system that will vibrate your phone if you forget to score a ball. Never forget to score a ball again!
* Ability to score negative runs instead of a wicket (perfect for kids cricket!)
* Ability to score a wide and NOT count as an extra ball in the over (perfect for kids cricket!)
* and many more features to make score easy - including allowing a batter to bat twice in one innings, undo a wrong score, etc

Stats include:
Batting Average
Highest Score
Total Runs
Strike Rate
Total Innings Batted
Total Outs
Total Sixes
Total Fours
Total Dots
Total Balls faced
Total times dismissed bowled
Total times dismissed caught
and MANY MORE STATS!!


Exciting 'fresh' design.
Every cricket scorebook looks the same. Not true! We have designed our app differently! 

No longer is the design boring. Instead of showing the batter list while you score, we show coaching suggestions, live stats, current partnership, total innings dot-balls/scoring shots, and other helpful cricket tips.

Who is this app for?

If you are scoring or coaching kids cricket, youth cricket, social cricket, indoor cricket, gully cricket or backyard cricket - this app is for you. It keeps things simple, makes scoring fun, and is completely FREE (in-app purchase available for stats).

Who is this app not for?

If you are a senior cricketer, or play in a competitive grade - we suggest looking at an app that is built specifically for enhanced scoring & statistics (note: another advantage of our app is that it is free! Other enhanced Cricket scoring apps do have a cost).

Download today!
This app is built for ease-of-use for kids, youth & social cricket. And for coaches who want live in-play suggestions to help improve batting & bowling.

There has never been a Cricket Scorebook App built for Kids, Youth or social cricket… until this one launched! Download for FREE today.

This app has been developed by cricketers, cricket coaches, kids cricket scorers and kid cricket umpires. Made for all cricketers, by cricketers!

We don't like cricket, we love it!
